modules/luni/src/main/native/luni/shared/luniglob.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Harmony LUNI natives initialization API.

#include <search.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include "vmi.h"
#include "harmonyglob.h"
#include "hyport.h"
#include "strhelp.h"

Functions

JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL JNI_OnLoad (JavaVM *vm, void *reserved)
 This DLL is being loaded, do any initialization required.
JNIEXPORT void JNICALL JNI_OnUnload (JavaVM *vm, void *reserved)
 This DLL is being unloaded, do any clean up required.

void *  reserved 
)

This DLL is being loaded, do any initialization required.

This may be called more than once.
